name: Lost Motus
description:
A black room, where are you? Good questions, we don't know either.

Controlls:

  1. LMB: Shoot
  2. 1-2-3 OR scrolling wheel: Change bullet type
  3. WASD: movement
  4. Space: Jump
  5. ESC: settings

Stefan Volkers - https://stefan.cherit.nl/
Saila Skride - https://sailaskride.com/
Sebastian Thomes - https://www.sebastianthomes.com/
